channel.title: Removing an NPC on click?

item.title: Removing an NPC on click?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

If you don’t have any advice please don’t post.

For an npc with hitpoints and a level it is click to attack not first click npc.

For shop keepers and other non-attackable NPC’s then it is case 155

Read full topic

item.title: Removing an NPC on click?

item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

Add it under case 155

Read full topic

item.title: Removing an NPC on click?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Well, i need help lol…

I tried to make it so that if you click a certain npc in my server while wearing a certain weapon it deletes them. But i couldn’t figure out a way of doing this. So i decided to try to make the npc get “1 hitted” by making it fall over and die. But that didn’t work correct.

Here is my code under click to attack, this is without the weapon.

if (NPCID == 47) { server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsDead = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 0; sendMessage("You kill the npc."); }

But when i click this npc ingame it dosn’t work, it just gives me the message but the npc is still standing there.

Thanks

Read full topic
